column5: Hi All,  saw this in the news...pretty sad for all of us really. .    Rude letter to burglary victim.    I dont think i'm suffering from winternet either....its summernet with the freekin' temps we have here at the moment...records being broken for this area daily.
The real trick is to live like I do.  When you got nothing worth stealing burglars aren't really a problem
If they break in and find nothing worth stealing, they trash your place in spite. Happened in our neighbourhood a couple of years back. Still cost the family thousands in home repairs.
There you go spoiling my perfect plan Bruce  Maybe I'll leave something vintage out for them...like my pocket fisherman... that should be enough to make them happy
Pocket Fisherman???? oh the memories....where do you live ....ill leave a note ...lol
